mapper.update: merge into cart c using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (c.goods_num = g.goods_num and c.member_num = #{memberNum}) when matched then update set c.cart_qty = c.cart_qty + #{cartQty}, c.cart_date = sysdate where member_num = #{memberNum} and goods_num = #{goodsNum} when not matched then insert (goods_num, member_num, cart_date, cart_qty) values (#{goodsNum}, #{memberNum}, sysdate, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select c.goods_num, c.cart_qty, c.member_num, g.goods_main_image, g.goods_main_store_image, g.goods_name, g.goods_price from cart c join goods g on c.goods_num = g.goods_num where c.member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where goods_num = #{goodsNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_qty = #{cartQty} where goods_num = #{goodsNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
